channel.title: Client wont open
channel.description: OK SO IM USING TESTSCAPE SOURCE AND I MADE A COMPILER A NO-IP AND PORTFOWARDED... I CLICK RUNSERVER AND NOTHING HAPPENS.. NO CLIENT OR ANYTHING! HOW DO I GET THE CLIENT TO OPEN AND SHIT? PLEASE HELP!

item.title: Client wont open
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Server and Client: two different things. You need to have a client that connects to the No-IP that you are using with the server to get onto your server.

Read full topic
